entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
